pr_title: Issue #7175: INTERFACE_DEF token support in RightCurlyCheck

timeline.message: Issue #7175: INTERFACE_DEF token support in RightCurlyCheck
Issue #7175: INTERFACE_DEF token support in RightCurlyCheck
Issue #7175: INTERFACE_DEF token support in RightCurlyCheck
Issue #7175: INTERFACE_DEF token support in RightCurlyCheck

timeline.bodyText: please add one more case like https://gaurabdg.github.io/checkstyle-tester-reports/regression/rcurly/diff/Hbase/index.html#A1
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText: @gaurabdg , please keep replying to review items, it help a lot.
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText:
In google style, it says that it is okay to have something like interface I1 {} .... So shall I keep INTERFACE_DEF in the alone token list since others are there too or remove it?

this is really strange ... I am not sure why we use alone, even Google style clearly state that empty block is ok. Empty interfaces are very common pattern (marker interfaces).
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -93,7 +93,7 @@
             <property name="option" value="alone"/>
             <property name="tokens"
              value="CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, STATIC_INIT,
-                    INSTANCE_INIT, ANNOTATION_DEF, ENUM_DEF"/>
+                    INSTANCE_INIT, ANNOTATION_DEF, ENUM_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF"/>

replies.bodyText:
It will be resolved in #7541 , in google config we use XpathSuppression:

  
    
      checkstyle/src/main/resources/google_checks.xml
    
    
        Lines 91 to 102
      in
      4768470
    
    
    
    

        
          
                   <module name="RightCurly"> 
        

        
          
                       <property name="id" value="RightCurlyAlone"/> 
        

        
          
                       <property name="option" value="alone"/> 
        

        
          
                       <property name="tokens" 
        

        
          
                        value="CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, STATIC_INIT, 
        

        
          
                               INSTANCE_INIT, ANNOTATION_DEF, ENUM_DEF"/> 
        

        
          
                   </module> 
        

        
          
                   <module name="SuppressionXpathSingleFilter"> 
        

        
          
                     <!-- suppresion is required till https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/issues/7541 --> 
        

        
          
                     <property name="id" value="RightCurlyAlone"/> 
        

        
          
                     <property name="query" value="//RCURLY[parent::SLIST[count(./*)=1] 
        

        
          
                                                            or preceding-sibling::*[last()][self::LCURLY]]"/>
replies.author: romani
